text: Trichopetalidae is a family of millipedes in the order Chordeumatida. There are about 5 genera and at least 30 described species in Trichopetalidae. ==Genera== * Causeyella * Mexiterpes Causey, 1963 * Scoterpes Cope, 1872 * Trichopetalum Harger, 1872 * Trigenotyla Causey, 1951 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Chordeumatida Category:Millipede families
title: Trichopetalidae
